AccessSystem.Architecture

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • AccessSystem.Architecture.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observers, java.io.Serializable

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Observers

    Room Class: Architecture Hierarchy

    Creates a Room that holds information about the type of room and security, Used as part of the architecture chain. Instances of the Room class are created through the architecture factory.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.Integer roomNumber,
            java.lang.String roomName,
            java.lang.String floorName,
            java.util.List<RoomType> roomRoles,
            java.lang.String buildingCode,
            Subject floor,
            AccessLogger accessLogger,
            EmergencyLogger emergencyLogger)
        Default Constructor: Assigns a room number, Secure room status, Room Name and floor name. Room is not in emergency mode by default.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - The current room number.
        roomName - The current room name.
        floorName - The floor the room is found on.
        roomRoles - The rooms roles.
        floor - The floor the room subscribes to.
        accessLogger - Access Logger for this university.
        buildingCode - the building code the room resides in.
        emergencyLogger - Emergency Logger for this university.
